long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy Bookmark Viewer enhances your new tab page by displaying your bookmarks in an organized dashboard. This extension presents your bookmarks in a grid layout for quick access.
Features:

- Grid Layout: View your bookmarks in a structured grid format.
- Bookmark Grouping: Bookmarks are categorized into 'All Bookmarked,' 'Bookmarks Bar,' and 'Other Bookmarks' for easier navigation.
- Visual Elements: Each bookmark displays its icon and title.
- Search Functionality: Use the search bar to locate specific bookmarks.
- Theme Options: Choose between light and dark modes.
- Chrome Integration: Works with your existing Chrome bookmarks without requiring import or export.

Easy Bookmark Viewer aims to streamline your bookmark management and enhance your browsing experience. It transforms your new tab into a personalized web dashboard.

For assistance or to provide feedback, please contact: support@himanshuraikwar.com
